DOC.brief_title: Complementary & Alternative Medicine Parkinson 's Disease ( CAM Care PD )
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , observational study design describe disease progression , symptom change , quality life , diet lifestyle habit among patient Parkinson 's disease ( PD ) . This study identify describe individual high quality life least amount disease activity , order describe medication , diet , lifestyle pattern associate lack PD disease progression high quality life . Participants ask complete online survey every six month five year . The time requirement hour hour half every six month . Participants need answer question feel comfortable answering . At six month time point send participant email link CAM Care PD survey , questionnaire health wellbeing ( complete REDCap ) . After participant complete survey send participant link second survey , dietary intake ( complete ASA24.gov ) . Because designate window time survey must complete , participant may receive gentle reminder u time run . This study design provide care . Participants encourage consult provider wish . Participants directly benefit study , information gather course study may help u begin assess longer-term effect complementary integrative care health , disease progression quality life PD patient .
